title: Disconnecting for no reason
body:
Hi,

I have been playing League of Legends for some years now on my MacBook Pro, but the last recent weeks I have been disconnected from games even though my internet is quite fast (30 MB/s), and my ms is on average 40. In average i disconnect once every second game I play, and it is really frustrating.

Anyone have an idea of what I might be doing to avoid these disconnect issues? 
I have been trying to reset my router, but that did not have any effect..

Would be really glad if anyone could help me out!

replies.body: That's some pretty good average ping so I don't believe this is coming from your internet speeds at all. It could be that something is blocking your network from getting a solid connection with our servers somehow, so let's be sure to check for that first. Check out your [**firewall settings and add exceptions if needed**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3). Be sure to test this is a custom/practice game first to see how well it worked or not.
